channel.title: convolution on Alok's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in convolution on Alok's Blog

item.title: Convolution
item.description: Convolution Image will be of shape: (H * W * channels) Our kernel will also be of shape (Hk * Wk * channels) The number of channels is same as it is volume convolution. In case of 1 * 1 convolution, the convolution helps decrease or increase the feature map dimensions.
